snippet: Mr. Herron, 33, who ran a drug gang and murdered three people, was sentenced at a hearing that included fiery exchanges involving his supporters, the judge, prosecutors and others.
abstract: Ronald Herron, onetime rapper who performed under name Ra Diggs and stands accused of running violent drug gang that killed three people, is given life prison sentence in Brooklyn federal court; Herron and supporters protest his sentence, setting tempestuous atmosphere at proceedings.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Herron, 33, who ran a drug gang and murdered three people, was sentenced at a hearing that included fiery exchanges involving his supporters, the judge, prosecutors and others.

headline.main: Ronald Herron, Brooklyn Rapper Known as Ra Diggs, Gets 12 Life Prison Terms
headline.print_headline: Brooklyn Rapper and Gang Leader Gets 12 Life Terms at Tempestuous Sentencing
